entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Upsala
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:49 AM CST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -22.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Upsala 10:00 AM CST Saturday 28 January 2023
Temperature: -22.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.5 kPa rising
Humidity: 71 %
Wind Chill: -31
Dewpoint: -26.7°C
Wind: WNW 11 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. High minus 20.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 20. Wind chill near minus 31. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM CST Saturday 28 January 2023
